title: Encountering the Personal God pt 2: Authority, Interpretation, Manipulation, and What is Rational
description:
Following up on my personal account of encountering Christ, I explore what authority such experiences have within various Christian traditions. I question the link between such experiences and the delivery of wisdom and I use John Vervaeke's own definition of rationality to propose that wisdom is distilled and delivered by religious laws, rules and rituals. 
John Vervaeke with Andrew Sweeney https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C42TmeFHNmI
Guy Sengstock and Paul VanderKlay on Marriage https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qMyACsMlNMs
Sevilla King and I compare Dietrich Von Hildebrandt with Pirsig https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dAu5zh_iRlo 
Me on Paul VanderKlay's channel:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EN-PQ3uUm4Y
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mSiXzJkIj0c
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WdlMtQSKszc
